text: it's pouring with rain I'm just
sheltering under the back of the car
here and the wind has been picking up
all morning and that's really why the
Pope had to cut short his visit it has
been dreadful dreadful weather all day
but this storm is getting closer and
basically the Pope was told if we don't
go back to the airport now
your plane is not going to be able to
take off and you're going to be stuck
here now the Pope has an enormous mass
with millions of people coming tomorrow
in Manila and so he made the difficult
decision to cut short his visit here by
four hours much to the disappointment of
people here there were hundreds of
people in the cathedral behind me here
waiting for him to give a speech and to
say prayers instead he went in and said
look I'm really sorry I've been told
I've got to go I've got to get in my car
and go back to the airport it's a real
disappointment there's still tremendous
enthusiasm here in Tacloban tens of
thousands probably hundreds of thousands
of people turning out in this dreadful
weather this morning to line the streets
and to go to the mass of the airport
